title: [Teras Isle, Grasslands]
description: The hills flatten into the earth and the wind whistles bitterly across the ground.  The grasses are thin here, and hang together in fitful clumps for shelter from the wind.  The very spirit of life seems to lose hope as it approaches the forlorn cliffs below.

The hills flatten into the earth and the wind whistles bitterly across the ground.  The grasses are yellow here, and hang together in fitful clumps for shelter from the wind.  The very spirit of life seems to lose hope as it approaches the forlorn cliffs below.
